mapper.insert: INSERT INTO giftycon (gNum, userId, gSubject, gRegdate, gExpdate, gHitCount, gPrice, gContent, gStatus, gUpdate_date, gSoldDate, gcNum, gIsProposable) VALUES (#{gNum}, #{userId}, #{gSubject}, SYSDATE, #{gExpdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{gPrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{gSoldDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gcNum}, #{gIsProposable, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO giftyImg (gImgNum, gImgSaveFileName, gNum) VALUES (giftyImg_seq.NEXTVAL, #{gImgSaveFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gNum})
mapper.select: SELECT g.gNum, gSubject, gPrice, gContent, gStatus, m.userNickName, g.userId, TO_DATE(g.gRegdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') gRegdate, gc.gcNum, gc.gcName, gHitCount, TO_DATE(g.gExpdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') gExpdate, TO_DATE(gUpdate_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') gUpdate_date, gSoldDate, gIsProposable, NVL(gWishCount, 0) gWishCount, (36.5 + (0.1* NVL(man.mannerStar, 0)) + (0.1* NVL(man.productStar, 0)) - NVL(man.minusDeg, 0)) AS manner FROM giftycon g JOIN member m ON g.userId = m.userId JOIN giftyCategory gc ON g.gcNum = gc.gcNum JOIN mannerProfile man ON g.userId = man.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT gNum, COUNT(giftyWishNum) gWishCount FROM gifty_WishList GROUP BY gNum ) c ON g.gNum = c.gNum WHERE g.gNum = #{gNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE giftycon SET gHitCount = gHitCount+1 WHERE gNum = #{gNum}

UPDATE giftycon SET gSubject=#{gSubject}, gExpdate=#{gExpdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gPrice=#{gPrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gContent=#{gContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gStatus=#{gStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gcNum=#{gcNum}, gIsProposable=#{gIsProposable, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE gNum = #{gNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gifty_WishList (giftyWishNum, userId, gwRegDate, gNum) VALUES (gifty_WishList_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{gNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM gifty_WishList WHERE gNum = #{gNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(giftyWishNum) FROM gifty_WishList WHERE gNum = #{gNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gifty_WishList WHERE gNum = #{gNum}
SELECT gNum, userId FROM gifty_WishList WHERE gNum = #{gNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reportGifty(repGiftyNum, rgReasonNum, reqGiftyContent, reqGiftyRegDate, reqGiftyChecked, gNum, userId) VALUES(reportGifty_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rgReasonNum}, #{reqGiftyContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'F', #{gNum}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE giftycon SET gUpdate_date = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') WHERE gNum = #{gNum}
